message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $175. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. $175 is a bit more than I was hoping to spend.  I'm willing to pay $125 for it.  Let me know what you think!

Hey Bob, thanks for your interest.  $125 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $150.  That's still a great deal for you, and it gets us closer to a deal. Let me know what you think!
